summary: The diff implements a Pro subscription system with owner exemption and $20 pricing for regular users. Backend logic grants free Pro access to admin/owner accounts, and the frontend UI conditionally displays upgrade options and Pro features based on ownership status. The implementation aligns well with all four requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that renames 'hasProSubscription' field to 'isPro'
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention any data migration or field renaming. This appears to be a refactoring decision not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: PaymentTier type definition with #free and #pro variants in backend
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Multiple pricing tiers or subscription plans' as a non-goal. While this is a simple enum, it introduces tier concepts not mentioned in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive list of 12 Pro features in frontend components
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements specify displaying Pro features in the modal but do not define what those features should be. The specific list ('Unlimited AI chat', 'Premium 3D games', 'Cloud storage', etc.) appears to be implementation invention.
